column5: Thin ice??? Check this site out...I hope it works. Cheers!!!!!   http://s28.photobucket.com/albums/c207/NRa...nrivermay12.flv

You have to see this. It's about Nunavut two guys driling a hole 10.8 feet thick. Awsome. Cut and paste link...search thin ice awsome videos. If someone likes to send me an email at [emailÂ protected] I will send you the video. Must see. Sorry.
Found the link:  http://s28.photobucket.com/albums/c207/NRa...nrivermay12.flv   lol!  That looks a wee dangerous.
how do they start that hole?
That vid has been around forever it seems LOL!! as to how they start the hole..... 4' extensions..  G

Caught this Baby in 8-9 feet roughly 20 kms south of Tuktoyaktuk, NWT,  Eskimo Lake, using two extensions and some.  Amazingly less than a foot of water. I had a huge Storm soft imitation fish jig and hand-line. Eskimo Lake. The Locals cooked her up and it was fantastic tasting.  I opted to fish instead of a Caribou hunt.
